item.title: Earliest deep-cave ritual compound in Southwest Asia discovered
item.description: A cave in Galilee, Israel, has yielded evidence for ritualistic gathering 35,000 years ago, the earliest on the Asian continent.

item.title: Black hole debate settled? Stellar-mass black holes found at the heart of the Milky Way's largest star cluster
item.description: Could a decades-long debate about the mysterious movements of stars in Omega Centauri, the largest star cluster in the Milky Way, finally be resolved?
